html:
RNS Number : 7571ZFTSE Russell26 January 2022

Further to the FTSE Russell Notice released on 21 January 2022 in relation to BHP Group Plc (UK) & BHP Group Ltd (Australia): Unification of Share Structure, please note the replacement for BHP Group Plc (UK) within fixed indexes.

All other details remain unchanged. Please see the updated notice below:

BHP Group Plc (UK) & BHP Group Ltd (Australia): Unification of Share Structure - Update Changes in FTSE UK Index Series

26 January 2022

Further to the FTSE Russell Notice published on 02 December 2021 in relation to the simplification of its corporate structure wherby BHP Group Plc (UK, constituent) and BHP Group Ltd (Australia, non constituent) will unify to create a single entity, please see details of affected indexes and effective dates below:

BHP Group Plc (UK, BH0P3Z9) will be deleted from the FTSE 100 Index.

Airtel Africa (UK, BKDRYJ4) will be added to the FTSE 100 Index and deleted from the FTSE 250 Index.

BMO Commercial Property Trust (UK, B4ZPCJ0) will be added to the FTSE 250 Index and deleted from the FTSE SmallCap Index.

All changes effective from 31 January 2022.

Full details of index changes are available on the FTSE Russell website.

For further information please contact FTSE Russell Client Services at info@ftserussell.com or call:
